name: Be a Light
description:
This game was made for the One Hour Game Jam where we have only 1 hour to make a game. This game was made in 58 minutes and 49 seconds. The theme for the jam was Light is Key. In this game you control a flashlight with your mouse, and must find all 10 squares in order to find the final square to win! 

This was a cool challenge, and while it is far from polished, I am very happy with the fact that I made a playable game with little to no bugs (that I know of) in under an hour! I only started making games 3 months ago, so the fact that I can make games like this, am continuing to learn, and apply these mechanics within the time frame of short game jams is really cool! I hope you all like this game!
